//-------TOPOSHEET 50K-------------------
Select Toposheet 50K...
//-----------------------------------SOIL SITE PARAMETERS 1---------------------------- //-------PHYSIOGRAPHIC CATEGORY / BOARD-------------------
Select Category...
//-------SUB-PHYSIOGRAPHIC UNIT-------------------
Select Unit...
//-----------------------------------SOIL SITE PARAMETERS 2---------------------------- //-------SLOPE GRADIENT-------------------
Select option...
0-1
1-3
3-8
8-15
15-30
30-50
>50
//-------SLOPE LENGTH -------------------
Select option...
0-50
50-150
150-300
300-600
>600
//-------EROSION-------------------
Select option...
None/Very slight
Very slight
Medium
Severe
Very severe
//-------RUNOFF-------------------
Select option...
Ponded
Very slow
Slow
Medium
Rapid
Very Rapid
//-------DRAINAGE-------------------
Select option...
Very Poor
Poor
Imperfect
Moderate well
Well
Some what Excessive
Excessive
//-------GROUND WATER DEPTH-------------------
Select option...
<1.0
1.0-2.0
2.0-5.0
5.0-10.0
>10.0
//-------FLOODING-------------------
Select option...
No
Occasational
Moderate
Severe
Very Severe
//-------SALT/ALKALI-------------------
Select option...
No
<2.0
20-50
>50
//-------PH-------------------
Select option...
<4.5
4.5-5.5
5.5-6.5
6.5-7.5
7.5-8.5
8.5-9.5
>9.5
//-------EC-------------------
Select option...
<2
2-4
4-8
8-15
15-25
25-50
>50
//-------STONE SIZE-------------------
Select option...
<2.5
2.5-7.5
7.5-25.0
>25.0
//-------STOINESS-------------------
Select option...
<3
3-15
15-40
40-75
>75
//-------ROCK OUTCROPS-------------------
Select option...
No
<5
5-10
10-20
20-50
>50
//-----------------------------------PRESENT LAND USE---------------------------- //-------------FOREST----------------------------
Select option...
F0 - Forest with no canopy
F1 - Thin Forest, sparse,vegetation
F2 - Moderately dense forest and fully stocked
F3 - Dense forest fully stocked with top canopy
//-------------CULTIVATED----------------------------
Select option...
C1 - Cultivated singlecrop
C2 - Cultivated double crop
C3 - Cultivated triple crop
//-------------TERRACES----------------------------
Select option...
T1 - Poorly Bunded
T2 - Poorly Terraced
T3 - Bench Terrace
//-------------PASTURE LAND----------------------------
Select option...
P - Pasture and Grazing Land
H - Hay Land
//-------------DEGRADED CULTURABLE----------------------------
Select option...
1 - Gullied and / or ravinous land
2 - Undulating Upland with or without scrub
3 - Surface Water logged and marshy
4 - Salt Affected Lands
5 - Shifting Cultivation Area
6 - Degrade Forest Lands
7 - Degrade Pastures/Grazing Lands
8 - Degrade Non-forest Plantation Lands
9 - Strip Land
10 - Sands
11 - Mining Industrial Waste Lands
//-------------DEGRADED UNCULTURABLE----------------------------
Select option...
A - Barren rocky/Stony waste/Sheet rock area
B - Steep Sloping Area
C - Snow covered and / or Glacial Area
//-------------LAND CAPABILITY CLASS----------------------------
Select option...
I
II
III
IV
V
VI
VII
VIII
//-------------LAND CAPABILITY SUB-CLASS----------------------------
Select option...
Erosion
Excess water
Climatic limitation
Moisture limitation
//-------------LAND IRRIGABILITY CLASS----------------------------
Select option...
I
II
III
IV
//-------------LAND IRRIGABILITY SUB-CLASS----------------------------
Select option...
Soil deficienies
Topography
Drynes
//-------------CROP----------------------------
Select option...
Cereals
Oilseeds
Cash crop
//-------------MANAGEMENT PRACTICE----------------------------
Select option...
Low
Medium
High
//---------------------------MORPHOLOGICAL_PARAMETERS------------------------------------------------------- //-------------------DISTINCTNESS-------------------
Select Distinctness...
Abrupt
Clear
Gradual
Diffuse
//-------------------TOPOGRAPHY-------------------
Select Topography...
Smooth
Wavy
Irregular
Broken
//-------------------DIAGNOSTIC_HORIZON-------------------
Select Diag. Horizon...
A
B
C
E
O
R
//-------------------MATRIX_COLOR-------------------
Select Colour...
d - Dry
m - Moist
r - Rubbed
//-------------------------------------------MOTTLE_COLOR----------------------------------- //-------------------MOTTLE_COLOR_ABUNDANCE-------------------
Select Abundance...
Few
Common
Many
//-------------------MOTTLE_COLOR_SIZE-------------------
Select Size...
Fine
Medium
Coarse
//-------------------MOTTLE_COLOR_CONTRAST-------------------
Select Contrast...
Faint
Distinct
Rominent
//-------------------MOTTLE_COLOR_TEXTURE-------------------
Select Texture...
Sand
Loamy fine sand
Loamy sand
Sandy loam
Loam
Silt loam
Silt
Sandy clay loam
Clay loam
Silly clay loam
Sandy clay
Silty clay
Clay
//--------------------------------COARSE_FRAGMENTS------------------- //-------------------COARSE_FRAGMENTS_SIZE-------------------
Select Size...
Fine gravel(<2.5cm)
Coarse gravel(2.5-7.5cm)
Stone(7.5-25.5)
Boulder(>25.0cm)
//----------------------------------STRUCTURE------------------- //-------------------STRUCTURE_SIZE-------------------
Select Size...
Very fine
Fine
Medium
Coarse
Very coarse
//-------------------STRUCTURE_GRADE-------------------
Select Grade...
0-Structureless
1-Week
2-Moderate
3-Strong
//-------------------STRUCTURE_TYPE-------------------
Select Type...
Granular
Lrumb
Columnar
Prismatic
Plasty
Angular blocky
Sub angular blocky
Single grain
Massive
//---------------------------------------CONSISTENCE------------------- //-------------------CONSISTENCE_D-------------------
Select Dry...
l - Loose
s - Soft
sh - Slightly hard
h - Hard
vh - Very hard
eh - Extremely hard
//-------------------CONSISTENCE_M-------------------
Select Moist...
l - Loose
vfr - Very friable
fr - Friable
fi - Firm
vfi - Very firm
efi - Extremely firm
//-------------------CONSISTENCE_W-------------------
Select Wet...
so - Non-sticky
ss - Slightly sticky
s - Sticky
vs - Very sticky
po - Non-plastic
ps - Slightly plastic
p - Plastic
vp - Very plastic
//-----------------------------------POROSITY------------------- //-------------------PORO_S-------------------
Select Size...
vf - Very fine
f - Fine
m - Medium
c - Coarse
//---------------PORO_Q-----------------------
Select Quantity...
f - Few
c - Common
m - Many
//-------------------------------CUTANS----------------------------- //-------------------CUTANS_TY-------------------
Select Argillan...
Fe - Ferran
Mn - Mangen
O - Organ
//-------------------CUTANS_TH-------------------
Select Thickness...
tn - Thin
mtk - Moderately thick
tk - Thick
//-------------------CUTANS_Q-----------------------------
Select Quantity...
p - Patchy
b - Broken
c - Continuous
//------------------------------------NODULES------------------- //-------------------NODULES_S-------------------
Select Size...
vf - Very fine
f - Fine
m - Medium
c - Coarse
//-------------------NODULES_Q-------------------
Select Quantity...
f - Few
c - Common
m - Many
//------------------------------ROOTS------------------- //-------------------ROOTS_S-------------------
Select Size...
vf - Very fine
f - Fine
m - Medium
c - Coarse
//-------------------ROOTS_Q-------------------
Select Quantity...
f - Few
c - Common
m - Many
//-------------------ROOTS_EFFERVESCENCE-------------------
Select Effervescence...
e - Slight effervescence
es - Strong effervescence
ev - Violent effervescence
